text:
Harry J. Skornia
June 9. 1955
3
outing for Elizabeth and Ricky if we were to come over and stay
overnite on the Fourth. Are there tickets to the display? If
so, could you secure three for me and what about the motel and
HOTEL SITUATION. WOULD IT BE AWFULLY CROWDED? COULD YOU SECURE
ONE OF THOSE ROOMS OR A ROOM IN THE UNION FOR THE THREE OF US
FOR THAT ONE NIGHT ONLY?
Si NC/ERELY
Director
WBAA
JSM:gw
Enclosures
